sample_2.title: Split a PDF document into multiple files
sample_2.content_1: Use the [Split Document](https://docs.groupdocs.com/merger/java/split-document/) feature to break a large PDF into smaller, more manageable files. This is useful for extracting specific sections or pages.
sample_2.content_2: You can split a document using various criteria, such as page range, specific start and end pages, or even odd/even page numbers.
